titleStmt.title: Choice and practical expositions on four select psalms viz. the fourth psalm, in eight sermons, the forty-second psalm, in ten sermons, the fifty-first psalm, in twenty sermons, the sixty-third psalm, in severn sermons / preached by the reverend and learned Thomas Horton ... ; left perfected for the press under his own hand.
titleStmt.author: Horton, Thomas, d. 1673.
